title: Marine Sniper: 93 Confirmed Kills
description: Tells the exciting true story of Sergeant Carlos Hathcock, a legendary Marine sniper in the Vietnam War.He's silent, invisible. He lies in one position for days, barely twitching a muscle, able to control his heartbeat and breathing. His record has never been matched: 93 confirmed kills. This is the story of Sergeant Carlos Hathcock, Marine sniper, legend of military lore.
author: Charles Henderson
